author: chfast
content: <@393119312350543872> what is the easiest way to move EOF tests in ethereum/tests from Prague to Osaka?

author: dimitry8570
content:
The easiest would be just to refill it using Osaka fork. But as far as I remember eof tool had no fork arg back then. 
Also I see many tests are in Copier format which is just a generated test using some other tool.

Ideally the tests must be migrated to .py
But if you want we can refill it using retesteth

author: chfast
content: That would be very helpful. But we need to make the change in evmone first.

author: dimitry8570
content:
Does eof Prague differs from eof Osaka?

Since there no states, no transactions. Its just container code.

author: pdobacz
content: Here is the PR, basically a find-replace. The manually modified .JSON files pass with evmone (with EOF moved to Osaka), but I cannot fill it with retesteth https://github.com/ethereum/tests/pull/1408

author: pdobacz
content: And here the evmone one https://github.com/ethereum/evmone/pull/1060, if needed to fill.
